Notes.Text:
This update for libvirt fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2019-3886: Fixed an information leak which allowed to retrieve the guest
  hostname under readonly mode (bsc#1131595).

Vulnerabilities.Description: An incorrect permissions check was discovered in libvirt 4.8.0 and above. The readonly permission was allowed to invoke APIs depending on the guest agent, which could lead to potentially disclosing unintended information or denial of service by causing libvirt to block.
